name: UpdateTrelloCardCustomField
description:
Update or remove a custom field value on a Trello card.

Use this tool to set, update, or remove the value for a custom field on a Trello card. Ideal for managing card data and keeping your board updated with the latest information.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello card where the custom field value will be set or updated.

value_schema.description: ID of the card that the Custom Field value should be set/updated for

parameters.name: custom_field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom field on the Trello card.

value_schema.description: ID of the Custom Field on the card.

parameters.name: custom_field_value
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the value to set, update, or remove for the custom field on the Trello card.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: idCard
parameters.description: ID of the card that the Custom Field value should be set/updated for

value_schema.description: ID of the card that the Custom Field value should be set/updated for

parameters.name: idCustomField
parameters.description: ID of the Custom Field on the card.

value_schema.description: ID of the Custom Field on the card.
